response.overview: Conductor Zara follows the story of Zara, a humble city bus conductor whose simple routines change when he unexpectedly forms a bond with a young college girl who mistakes him for someone else online. As their connection deepens through voice notes and small moments, Zara's hidden insecurities and dreams begin to surface. But when the truth about his identity is revealed, both of them face emotional conflict, heartbreak, and the difficult journey toward understanding who they really are.
response.title: Conductor Zara
